data.title: Strategic Momentum : Testimonials
data.meta_description: Strategic Momentum implements Employee Relationship Management (ERM) within an organization to sustain a Breakaway Innovation®. ERM increases employee asset value in the same manner Customer Relationship Management (CRM) increases customer asset value.
data.text:
The Academy Lean Sigma is a Mexican institution that helps manufacturing companies improve quality, industrial maintenance supply chain management. Academy Lean Sigma helps companies continuously improve through the rigorous application of Kaizen and Six Sigma methodologies.

http://www.academialeansigma.com

Compendia Inc., formerly Master Manuals, is the national leader in the development, production and distribution of document and information management solutions for the homebuilding industry since 1999.

http://www.compendiainc.com

A research-driven biopharmaceutical company devoted to identifying, developing and marketing innovative products in the fields of infertility, obstetrics, urology, gastroenterology, endocrinology and osteoarthritis.

http://www.ferring.com

A renowned specialist in the development and marketing of standard software and system solutions for digital signage and interactive kiosk systems.

http://www.friendlyway.com

A development experience for leaders and leadership teams that provides transformational growth in areas proven to differentiate superior from average leaders.

http://gild.linkageinc.com

High Technology Solutions, acquired by Wireless Facilities. Inc., was a provider of technical outsourcing services to the U.S. Navy, HTS has significantly diversified its core capabilities and customer base.

http://www.wfinet.com

Helps companies focus on growing their business by taking on the task of implementing enterprise software that fits their business process and goals perfectly. They develop custom software solutions and have their own development centers in the Middle East.

http://www.integrantinc.com

One of the world's largest manufacturers of embedded computer technology (ECT) and supplies leading OEMs, system integrators and application providers in the most varied market segments such as data and telecommunications, automation, mobile computing, medical technology, military technology, aerospace, and measuring and control engineering.

http://us.kontron.com

Prime contractor in Command, Control and Communications, Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (CÂ³ISR), Government Services, Aircraft Modernization and Maintenance (AM&M) and has the broadest base of Specialized Products in the industry.

http://www.l-3com.com

MEI is a thermal solutions company for semiconductor, subsystem and systems OEMs. The company specializes in the rapid design and manufacture of custom thermal components, including heat sinks, fans, blowers, fan sinks, heat pipes and various custom solutions.

Providing business technology solutions to organizations of all sizes, serving commercial as well as government clients.

http://www.mgsportal.com

Netmange, acquired by Micro Logic Ltd., provides Unix emulation on PC, 3270/5250 emulation on PC, TCP/IP apps and server technology, OEM technology licensing for cable modems, ASIC licensing technology for custom TCP/IP apps and SNMP licensing technology.

http://www.netmanage.com

Leading global security company whose 120,000 employees provide innovative systems, products, and solutions in aerospace, electronics, information systems, shipbuilding and technical services to government and commercial customers worldwide.

http://www.northropgrumman.com

Nventa, acquired by Akela Pharma in April 2009, is developing innovative therapeutics for the treatment of infectious diseases and cancer with a focus on human papillomavirus (HPV).

http://www.nventacorp.com

Maxwell Interactive, a division of Maxwell Technology, developed computer and web-based training. This division was eventually acquired by High Technology Solutions Inc.

The experts’ choice for online bridge. OKbridge, Inc. is an online bridge club dedicated to serving the worldwide community of bridge players by providing superior software and service.

http://www.OKBridge.com

Orchestream, acquired by MetaSolv Software, which in turn was acquired by Oracle Corporation, provides single server technology for QoS over the Internet for network management using TCP/IP.

http://www.oracle.com/metasolv/index.html

A globally recognized leader in professional audio, they provide new standards of reliability and performance through the development of breakthrough technologies. QSC's products meet the demanding requirements of audio professionals in concert, installation, portable entertainment and cinema applications.

http://www.qscaudio.com

Technology and innovation leader specializing in defense, homeland security and other government markets throughout the world.

http://www.raytheon.com

San Diego Regional Airport Authority is a public entity created by state law to operate the Airport and plan for the region's future air transportation needs.

http://www.san.org/Airport_Authority/index.asp

StÃ¥ngÃ¥staden is a Swedish semi-public property management company with over 300 employees for the City of LinkÃ¶ping.

http://www.stangastaden.se

Note: site is in Swedish

Technology Consulting Group helps it’s clients architect a solution based on the specific needs of each customer and then assemble the most effective group of experts to fulfill the design.

http://www.technologyconsulting.biz

Trucost Food Systems provided an online platform to the foodservice industry that provided restaurant operators transparency into the supplier market for availability, price and quality. This was a venture backed start-up company.

The mission of UC San Diego Extended Studies and Public Programs is to serve the critical lifelong knowledge and skill development needs of individuals, organizations, and the community.

http://extension.ucsd.edu

United Through Reading is a nonprofit 501(c)(3) public benefit organization. Our mission is to unite families facing physical separation by facilitating the bonding experience of reading aloud together.

http://www.unitedthroughreading.org

WsRadio is the largest independent Internet talk radio station in the world including eBay Radio for eBay, Washington Times Radio for "America's Newspaper", PayPal Radio for Paypal, Marketing Matters Live! for the American Marketing Association, Price Waterhouse Coopers Radio and for high profile companies, associations, and individuals with business, health, hobby, political and special interest shows as well as shows for Entrepreneur Magazine and HayHouse Publications.

http://www.wsradio.com

Zoovy provides the means for merchants to easily build and maintain an online store, market their products online and provide a safe and secure checkout. It also includes integration with the worlds premier online marketplaces, including eBay, Froogle, Amazon and Shopping.com. Zoovy also allows merchants to manage more aspects of their online business, including reporting, inventory, customer relations tools, and advanced cross selling features.

http://www.zoovy.com
